title: Break!
description: Forced error from Federer on 30-40; and Monfils secures the first break to lead 3-1

title: save
description: Monfils saves a couple of break points to lead 4-1

title: Break!
description: Gael breaks again; now serving for the set at 5-1

title: Monfilis 6-1
description: Killer set of tennis from Monfils

title: Break
description: Federer nets to be broken for the third time today. Monfils 2-1

description: Rog not getting into any of his return games as Monfils holds to lead 5-3

title: Monfilis 6-4
description: Monfils holds to take a two-set lead
column6: still putting in work with that forehand

title: Break!
description: The ball is out from Federer and that may be the decisive break. Monfils 3-2

description: Monfils holds to lead 5-3; one game away from leveling the tie
